default.title_faceA: Tap the card to reply to an answer
default.endtitle_A: We’ll see if [partenaireName] knows you well!

question_1.question: you are alone on a deserted island with [partenaireName], what do you do?

question_1.b: We build a house to live in

question_2.question: You and [partenaireName] are alone in a broken elevator, what do you do?
question_2.a: I figure that we’re both trapped and we might as well enjoy it
question_2.c: We try to have a nice time together
